text: A total of 48 poliovirus genomes were used in this study ( Table 1 ) . The serial number ( SN ) , genotype , length value , isolated region , GenBank accession numbers , and other detail information about these strains were listed in Table 1 . All of the sequences were downloaded from NCBI http : / / www . ncbi . nlm . nih . gov / Genbank / , and 48 poliovirus genomes were selected in the study . The other sequences with > 98 % sequence identities were excluded .
